Method.name: OnPageBODY
Method.Implementation:
Write "" Write ! s Dat1=%request.Get("Dat1") s Dat2=%request.Get("Dat2") if Dat1?1.2N1"/"1.2N1"/"4N s Dat1=$ZDH(Dat1,4) e s Dat1=+$H if Dat2?1.2N1"/"1.2N1"/"4N s Dat2=$ZDH(Dat2,4) e s Dat2=+$H s showdate=$S(%request.Get("showdate")="false":0,1:1) s MM=$$$TunesVariableGlobal("MM") //список аббревиатур мастермакс через запятую s VC=$$$TunesVariableGlobal("VC") s TL=$$$TunesVariableGlobal("TL") s innerkurs=+$$$TunesVariableGlobal("innerkurs") w "Курс = "_$J(innerkurs,"",2) //списки которые через запятую перегоним в массивы, и вырежем пробелы f brandname="MM","VC","TL" d . f i=1:1:$L(@brandname,",") d . . //обрезаем пробелы . . s abbr=$TR($P(@brandname,",",i)," ","") . . q:abbr="" . . s @brandname@(abbr)="" s glob=$NA(^mtempReport($I(^mtempReport))) k @glob //выбираем все StorageOutItems за указанный период с ненулевым количеством &sql(declare bort cursor for select ID,doc,doc->Source->Kontr->Name,doc->Source->Kontr->region2->Name,total,doc->Dat,doc->Summa,doc->Name,Goods->abbr into :ID,:doc,:KontrName,:RegionName,:total,:Dat,:Summa,:docname,:Goodsabbr from Docs.StorageOutItems where doc->Dat>=:Dat1 and doc->Dat<=:Dat2 and doc->stat=2 and quantreal>0 order by doc->Kontr->Name) &sql(open bort) f &sql(fetch bort) q:SQLCODE d . //if 'showdate s doc=1 . //s @glob@(Dat,Kontr,ID,"GoodsName")=GoodsName . k undefined . s Goodsabbr=$TR(Goodsabbr," ","") . s total=total*innerkurs . s Summa=Summa*innerkurs . s @glob@("data",doc,"docname")=docname . s @glob@("data",doc,"Dat")=$ZD(Dat,4) . s @glob@("data",doc,"KontrName")=KontrName . s @glob@("data",doc,"RegionName")=RegionName . s @glob@("data",doc,"Summa")=$G(@glob@("data",doc,"Summa"))+total . if abbr="" s abbr=" " . if Goodsabbr'="" d . . if $d(MM(Goodsabbr)) s brand="MM" . . if $d(TL(Goodsabbr)) s brand="TL" . . if $d(VC(Goodsabbr)) s brand="VC" . if (Goodsabbr="")||(('$d(MM(Goodsabbr)))&('$d(VC(Goodsabbr)))&('$d(TL(Goodsabbr)))) d . . s brand="undefined" . . s @glob@("data",doc,brand,"names",$S(Goodsabbr="":" ",1:Goodsabbr))=" " . s @glob@("data",doc,brand,"total")=$G(@glob@("data",doc,brand,"total"))+total &sql(close bort) //s i="" f s i=$O(undefined(i)) q:i="" s undefined=$G(undefined)_","_i s $E(undefined,1)="" w "" w "" w "" w "" w "" w "" s doc="" f s doc=$O(@glob@("data",doc)) q:doc="" d . s MM=$G(@glob@("data",doc,"MM","total")) . s TL=$G(@glob@("data",doc,"TL","total")) . s VC=$G(@glob@("data",doc,"VC","total")) . s RegionName=$G(@glob@("data",doc,"RegionName")) . s Summa=$G(@glob@("data",doc,"Summa")) . s KontrName=$G(@glob@("data",doc,"KontrName")) . s Dat=$G(@glob@("data",doc,"Dat")) . s docname=$G(@glob@("data",doc,"docname")) . s undefined=$G(@glob@("data",doc,"undefined","total")) . f i="MM","TL","VC","RegionName","Summa","KontrName","Dat","docname","undefined" d . . if @i="" s @i=" " . w "" . w "" . w "" . w "" . w "" . w "" . w "" . w "" . w "" . s UndefinedNames="" . s undefname="" f s undefname=$O(@glob@("data",doc,"undefined","names",undefname)) q:undefname="" d . . s UndefinedNames=UndefinedNames_","_undefname . s $E(UndefinedNames,1)="" . w "" . w "" w "
НомерДатаКонтрагентФедеральный округРублёвая суммаMMTLVCНеизвестный бренд
"_docname_""_Dat_""_KontrName_""_RegionName_""_Summa_""_MM_""_TL_""_VC_""_undefined_"
" k @glob Write !,""

Method.name: OnPageHEAD
Method.Implementation: Write "<head>" Write !,"<meta http-equiv=""Content-Type"" content=""charset=windows-1251"">" Write !,"<!-- Put your page Title here -->" Write !,"<title> Отчёт по суммам отгрузок </title>",! Write !,"</head>"

Method.name: OnPageHTML
Method.Implementation: Write "<html>" Write ! Do ..OnPageHEAD() Write !,! Do ..OnPageBODY() Write !,"</html>"

Method.name: OnPreHTTP
Method.Implementation:
d:%session.NewSession . s %session.EndSession=1 . s ses=%request.Get("sessionid",1) . s %session=%session.GetSession(ses)
s ContentType=%request.Get("ContentType") set %response.ContentType = ContentType if ContentType="application/x-msexcel" do %response.SetHeader("Content-Disposition","attachment;excel.xls") set %response.Expires = "Thu, 01 Apr 2003 00:00:00 GMT" Quit 1
